source_objects.title: Food & Beverage
source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.

items.title: French Desserts and Gateaux Cakes
items.headline: Learn how to make french desserts from one of the world's best pastry chefs
objectives_summary: Make several types of pastry cakes with different types of dough, classical and modern like dacquoise, and fillings like jam, marmalade, namelaka

items.headline: Make standard dishes time-saving & exquisite with "Yakuzen Tsukurioki", [Hottoku-ni] makes your daily cooking easy & fun
objectives_summary: ・ How to make yakuzen that eliminates cooking time and hassle, and frees you from the guilty feeling of omission
・ How to make yakuzen that are quick, delicious, and healthy
・ 5 recipes and how to make arrangements

items.title: Persian Cooking: Learn how to master Baghali Polo ba Mahiche

visible_instructors.job_title: Recipe Developer specialising in Persian Cuisine
visible_instructors.name: Hami
visible_instructors.title: Hami Sharafi

items.headline: Become an expert at preparing lamb shanks and cooking aromatic Persian Saffron Rice with Dill and Broad Beans
objectives_summary: Which type of pans are ideal for Persian rice and stews
How to prepare perfect Persian lamb shanks (Mahiche)
How to prepare aromatic Persian rice with broad beans and dill (Baghali Polo) including Tahdig (crispy rice from the bottom of the pan)

items.title: Simple Sicilian Cooking with Nonna Grace:  Sarde a Beccafico
items.headline: Digest the island of Sicily; drink up some Italian phrases and learn to love sardines with this simple Sicilian recipe!
objectives_summary: Prepare and cook a simple, savory and traditional Sicilian dish called Sarde a Beccafico
Know the story behind the dish
Acquire a brief history of the beautiful Italian island of Sicily, where the dish was born

items.title: Cook Fish like a Three Star Chef

visible_instructors.job_title: Improve & master your cooking skills with online courses
visible_instructors.name: Walter
visible_instructors.title: Walter Trupp

items.headline: Discover all the secrets you need know about cooking fish!
objectives_summary: Learn how to cook fish like a Michelin star chef so that you never fail again cooking fish in your own kitchen

items.title: Chicken Biryani
items.headline: Learn how to cook the most popular and tasteful Indian recipe by traditional and healthy way, step by step.
objectives_summary: Students will be able to cook the most tasteful and delicious recipe in India.
Students will know how to cook chicken Biryani.
students will know how to cook the chicken and rice with biryani souce.

items.title: Elementary Wine Course
items.headline: All you need to know about wine in a simple and approachable way.
objectives_summary: Wine Basics
How to Read the Label
Main Grape Varieties

items.title: How to Write a Successful Digital Recipe Cookbook

visible_instructors.name: Richard
visible_instructors.title: Richard Holmes

items.headline: Learn how to turn all your favourite recipes into a digital cookbook product that you can sell online
objectives_summary: Turn recipes into digital cookbooks that can be shared with friends or sold online
Choose which marketing channels work best for selling e-cookbooks
Understand why picking a niche is crucial for the success of your cookbook

items.title: Kitchen Basics

visible_instructors.job_title: The Busy persons guide to cooking
visible_instructors.name: Tamzin
visible_instructors.title: Tamzin Cochrane

items.headline: Learn the basics of the kitchen, from food hygiene to knives, build your confidence, to enjoy creating in the kitchen.
objectives_summary: Understand the equipment in a kitchen
Understand which equipment is essential and which equipment would be nice to have.
Be able to use the correct knife for the correct job

items.title: Italian pizza at home. Easy method + En + De Subtitles!
items.headline: The easiest method that exists for guaranteed success!
objectives_summary: Students will be able to prepare Italian pizza and focaccia at home, avoiding the most common mistakes and accidents.
Students will learn the method to calculate the exact amount of dough to be used in different types of baking pans, both round and rectangular, of any size.
Students will learn the recipe for Italian pizza and will also learn to prepare 2 types of buns.

items.title: Bolognese cooking class for beginners and food lovers
items.headline: How to cook Bolognese and Italian cuisine in easy way
objectives_summary: how to cook Italian cuisine in a simple way for beginners and food lovers

items.headline: Take your Pastry Skills to the Next Level By Mastering Puff Pastry
objectives_summary: Understand the Ingredients used in Making Pastry
Understanding the Lamination Process of Single Folds and Book Folds
How to Enclose a Butter Block in making Pastry

items.title: Learning to bake 7 kinds of Cookies
items.headline: Step by step to make 7 kinds of cookies with 4 techniques were explained very detailed in every lecture
caption_languages: ภาษาอังกฤษ [อัตโนมัติ]

Learning to bake 7 kinds of Cookies
Learning to bake Danish Cookies

items.title: Recipes For Authentic Japanese Meals

visible_instructors.job_title: 言語インストラクター
visible_instructors.name: MIKIKO
visible_instructors.title: MIKIKO KOIKE

items.headline: That You Can Make At Home Easily And Quickly
objectives_summary: You'll know how to cook some of the Japanese home-cooked dishes that Japanese people have been eating since their childhoods.
You'll know the way to cook popular Japanese soul food within about 30 min.
You'll know how to use some of the typical Japanese seasonings such as curry roux and dashi powder.

items.title: All About Cakes
items.headline: Baking, filling, and frosting 3 unique cake designs!
objectives_summary: Learn to bake, fill, frost and decorate the perfect cake!
Create professionally looking layered cake with three unique designs: the watercolor cake, the "naked" cake and the fault line cake.
Use different techniques to create show stopping decorations such as chocolate sails, meringues toppers, isomalt bowl and more.

items.title: Cheese Cake
items.headline: The best cheesecake with ChefSetee
objectives_summary: Learning the right way how to make perfect American cheesecake
I will give you the best biscuit for your cheesecake
I will teach you how to make your cream cheese smooth and nice
